Reason: The _transientMode configuration option in the prevayler software project is performance-sensitive because changing its value significantly affects system performance. When _transientMode is enabled, the system operates in a mode that prioritizes speed over durability, leading to faster execution times but potentially higher memory consumption. On the other hand, disabling _transientMode results in slower execution times but lower memory usage. This trade-off between speed and memory consumption makes _transientMode a performance-sensitive configuration option.
